document.full_text: toronto blue jays starting pitcher brett cecil has been optioned to las vegas of the pacific coast league following the left-hander's slow start to the major league baseball season, the team said on thursday.
document.title: blue jays send struggling pitcher brett cecil to minors
lines_and_colors: toronto blue jays starting pitcher brett cecil has been optioned to las vegas of the pacific coast league following the left-hander's slow start to the major league baseball season, the team said on thursday.
